summary: This code imports the get_res function from caer.video, sets a video path, and calls the get_res function with the video path to retrieve the width and height of the video, then prints them out.

details.comment: This code imports the get_res function from caer.video, sets a video path, and calls the get_res function with the video path to retrieve the width and height of the video, then prints them out.
details.content:
from caer.video.frames_and_fps import get_res
videoPath = "/root/Desktop/works/pyjom/samples/video/cat_invalid_eye_rolling.gif"
width, height = get_res(videoPath)
print(width, height)
